subject: Communication
title: TED Talks: The New Oratory Standard
description: A micro-lesson that makes TED Talks: The New Oratory Standard usable.

hook.text: In 2006, TED started posting talks online for free. Public speaking would never be the same.

buildup.text: Suddenly, millions could watch world-class speakers. A new standard for presentation quality emerged.

discovery.text: The TED formula: one big idea, personal stories, minimal slides, and an 18-minute limit.

twist.text: TED democratized speaking but also created pressure. Now every conference expects 'TED-level' talks.

climax.text: The most-viewed TED talk has over 75 million views â€” more than most blockbuster movies' opening weekends.

punchline.text: TED proved that great ideas, well told, travel the world.

quiz.question: When did TED start posting talks online for free?
